articles.title: Hungary Blocked Joint EU Statement on Putin's ICC Arrest Warrant - Bloomberg
articles.description: Hungary blocked European Union member states from issuing a joint statement about an international arrest warrant against Russian President Vladimir Putin, according to people familiar with the matter.
